pullrequest.title: Ogre 1.9 support: remove CEGUI and fix warnings (#994, #995)

content.raw:
I can reproduce it. 

I think it's a separate issue from ogre 1.9. I updated the bounding box scale behavior in the joint maker pull request which broke this test, I'll fix this issue in a separate pull request.

Looks like jenkins doesn't build this test so it never picks it up
content.html:
I can reproduce it.

I think it's a separate issue from ogre 1.9. I updated the bounding box scale behavior in the joint maker pull request which broke this test, I'll fix this issue in a separate pull request.
